meanings.definition: Not used or put into practice.
meanings.sent1: The unexercised plan remained untouched on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The unexercised skills of the new employee were evident during the training session.
meanings.sent3: The unexercised bicycle in the garage felt neglected and lonely.
meanings.sent4: Her unexercised creativity was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The unexercised muscles of the athlete quickly grew weak and stiff.

meanings.definition: Not having been subjected to physical activity.
meanings.sent1: The unexercised dog preferred lounging on the couch all day.
meanings.sent2: The unexercised muscles of the patient needed gentle rehabilitation.
meanings.sent3: The unexercised playground equipment looked pristine and untouched.
meanings.sent4: Her unexercised body felt sluggish and out of shape.
meanings.sent5: The unexercised garden remained overgrown and wild.

meanings.definition: Not having been tested or proven.
meanings.sent1: The unexercised theory lacked real-world evidence to support it.
meanings.sent2: The unexercised hypothesis remained unexplored by researchers.
meanings.sent3: The unexercised recipe seemed like a risky culinary experiment.
meanings.sent4: Her unexercised idea was met with skepticism by the team.
meanings.sent5: The unexercised strategy had yet to face any challenges in the market.
